Review.Contenu: Support said they were sending me a link for a newer version of Acronis, which should of been in the original instructions. The email did not come for a long time. I rebooted my computer and redownloaded Acronis. Once re-down loaded, got message that it needed to repair the file. It finally did that and then it moved forwarded to clone. However the instructions were slightly different from the tutorial, but now in the process.

Review.Titre: Good Product, Scanner not working and excessive ship time.
Review.Contenu: AS always your product is great!.  I have been using Crucial to upgrade my computers for years.  This time two problems, your system scanner does not work!!  I had to manually input my model number to upgrade my pc.  Also, 13 days waiting to receive an item is ridiculous.  Nowadays many companies offer a free shipping option but 13 days from order to delivery is unheard of. Come on you can do better.

Review.Titre: Bought kit with caddy for my…
Review.Contenu: Bought kit with caddy for my application and the caddy did not work. I had to spend extra time and money to get the drive installed.
Too long getting here. Customer contact sloppy. Said it was coming UPS, no USPS no FEDX. tracking number didn't work. Product works fine at a good price.

Did not like the fact that you processed my payment at least 2 days before my purchase was "shipped". Then it took several days for UPS to acknowledge it had my purchase ready to ship. When I called Crucial customer support I talked with a guy who barely understood English and did very little that was actually helpful.

Good product, but company made a mistake.The company took my payment, sent a shipping confirmation, but didn't actually ship the product.  Waited a week for them to figure things out on their own.  They didn't.  They just responded with generic emails about delivery.  It took several back-and-forth emails with customer service before they poked the shipping dept to actually send the product. Things were fine after that.
Although Crucial has great products. I bought a SSD and it took a long time to be delivered. The product was shipped on a envelope.

Review.Titre: Drive works great, shipping and support poor
Review.Contenu: The drive works great, give that 5 stars, but it took them almost 2 weeks to deliver it. Also, I have tried several times to register my purchase on the Crucial site but, each time, the site says something went wrong or they cannot find my email--even though I use my email address to log into the site and to access my crucial account. So, still haven't registered it. Finally, when I had problems with tracking the shipment--when a week had passed and I still hadn't been able to track the package--I used telephone support and ended up talking to some fellow obviously from some call center in India. Really?

Review.Titre: Delivery did not go as I expected
Review.Contenu: Delivery did not go as I expected. First day, I received an email stating item shipped with a tracking code.Next day I tried the tracking code and it said invalid. I called Crucial and was told to wait two business days before tracking code would be activated. After two days it worked but said item would not be delivered until the ninth day after my order!I paid by credit card and believe shipment was not started until my payment cleared.Item arrived eight days after I placed the order.

Review.Titre: The hardware works perfectly.  That's the good news.
Review.Contenu: The hardware works perfectly so far, and the online videos were excellent.  But finding and using the cloning software was problematic.  The instructions on crucial.com and Acronis do not make it clear that you must find and use a specific version of the cloning software.  If you don't know that (I didn't) you will waste a lot of time.Also, the hardware was slow to arrive after I placed my order.

Review.Titre: your shipping company is worse the the…
Review.Contenu: your shipping company is worse the the post office next time send my orders to post office it will take a week less
Tracking the shipment was impossible.  Received a tracking number and it was not tracking by the USPO until the day it was delivered 2 weeks later

The item I purchased was excellent, and I am extremely satisfied with the quality of all of Crucial's merchandise. However, the shipping was so poor.  I ordered my item on Sep 6th.  It was delivered on Sep 16.  You used UPS MAIL INNOVATIONS expedited service, and it was a total joke.  Next time I buy a Crucial item,  I'm going to purchase it locally, even if it costs more.

I liked the cloning software. However, Crucial should remind buyers of ssd's for upgrades to get the migration kit--I just lucked out that I had a way to connect the ssd to my pc to clone it.  What I did not like, however, was not knowing I was replacing a full-size 4" x 6" hard drive in the original pc so I could purchase a mounting kit.  Fortunately, I was able to fix the ssd to the larger drive bay with a zip tie.  This is not a job for a novice as it requires very careful disassembly of the pc.

The product is very good, but the support to assist the installation isn't. The instructions on the paper need to be updated as well as the videos.  Had to exchange multiple emails with your customer service in order to get the correct software.

Crucial has a great product that I wanted (X8 2T), but ordering it off the website was clumsy with slipping ship dates. By the time mine was close to being shipped Crucial lowered their price but did not adjust the price for ones that were delayed in being shipped. The arrival time of the product was delayed another couple of days due to the Post Office misrouting the product.

I ordered supposedly "In Stock" items on Jan. 03. My items were not shipped until Jan. 11th. When I called around the 8th to see about my order, I could hear kids playing and yelling in the background and the rep kept putting me on hold, I would imagine a mom working from home, not very helpful at all. This used to be my "Go to" company for SSDs and Ram but I may have to reconsider. A very disappointing experience this time!

The hardware was great. However the software Ivwould not recommend. After 4 attempts to clone the drive, I gave up and used another software. I did call support and that was a nightmare.  Could not understand the first 2 techs. I finally requested someone in US but that didn't happen, however was able to understand the 3rd tech better. The other software worked without a hitch on the first attempt.  The computer is running great.

Pricing was great, ordering was easy. Product is AWESOME. However, the shipping time seemed like it took forever.I know it says "takes approx 8 business days" (which it actually did) but, I was really hoping that was just late case scenario. None the less the drive arrived and I was happy. I should mention,on Crucial's behalf, it was being shipped around Christmas and New Year holidays) . Soo I should actually give it a 4.

Review.Titre: Ups delivery service is too slow
Review.Contenu: Ups delivery service is too slowPlus they don't do the delivery , package was transfer to usps and took 3 days for the transfer right at the final destination?

Too slow to receive. It took almost 2 weeks from the date of order to receive the product. The shipping was ok, but it took a week to ship the product after I ordered it. If that was going to be necessary, it should have been made clear at the time of order so I could decide if I wanted to order it somewhere else. Unacceptable.

product is fantastic, thats why i ordered it. shipping is a yard sale. i dont remember being asked how, but how it came through was long and drawn out. other than that, i wouldnt buy any other ram for crucial work than crucial ram. precision workstation, in a business environment running high end analysis. it helped.

The scanner was amazing and easy to use and gave great suggestions for a beginner into the upgrading my laptop. I just wish there was more information on the site or a live person I could talk to while looking at upgrades and ask questions like the difference between DDR4 and DDR5 and if it would be compatible with my laptop or could be. Overall great service. Definitely pay for the faster shipping though.

Order Number: 1709179154439, I'm a long-time user of Crucial, and it has always been my first choice and recommendation.  I don't know what has happened to the company but something has!  My delivery still hasn't turned up, not even arrived in my country yet!  Won't be using them again.

Review.Titre: Need to work on shipping estimates
Review.Contenu: I would have given it 5 stars if it didn't take 2 weeks to get here.Love the site , product selection and suggestions on what is needed. I was excited to have the parts, then they didn't show up. Like I said 2 weeks to deliver.  Now a long time, just not the time quoted.

Review.Titre: I like the device but your systems and customer service need serious work..
Review.Contenu: I like the device.What I didn't like was:1. The shipping information was all wrong and left me with the impression that you never shipped my order.2. When I spoke to your customer service agent, he was VERY difficult to understand (accent and connection quality) and finally made me understand that the shipping information would be available within a week.  So, he is incompetent.Also, Trustpilot is displaying my profile image 90 degrees off.

Review.Titre: Failed to notify me of the availability…
Review.Contenu: Failed to notify me of the availability of XPS 8940 memory that was on back order.Could not accept my order to a PO Box for 2 x 64GB memory kits.Failed to respond to my request for shipping info.English was not understandable on phone support.

Review.Titre: The system scanner does not work for…
Review.Contenu: The system scanner does not work for me.  I have tried it on 2 different laptops, and 3 different browsers on those laptops.  It doesn't return any results.  I tried everything that support suggested, but it still fails. Support was able to point me towards compatible products, but the ease (and former reliability) of the system scanner had no equal.

First of all, the memory is tip-top.  Crucial memory has always been good.The delivery was slow for this day and age.  Order made on 6/9.  It was tendered to UPS Mail Innovations on 6/14.  Delivery to my metropolitan California address was on 6/20.  Part of the problem seems to have been their choice of carrier, but still, they took 5 days to ship the order.

Standard transaction, mediocre experience. Free shipping is dreadfully slow. I think I received three Prime deliveries in the same time it took me to get my Crucial delivery. Also, The USPS Innovations delivery offering is awful. It goes from UPS to USPS. And, the tracking code provided doesn't update often. If in doubt, prepare for the LONGEST processing and delivery time.This is in contrast to the service and delivery I've had years before where it was two business days. And that was free, too.Overall, I'd forego the 10% off to get faster delivery. In this competitive market, your offering needs to be a lot more attractive than a few dollars off your order.

Review.Titre: Offer the Solid State Drive and Connector as a Package
Review.Contenu: When you sell the solid state drive you should tell the customer they can't install without the special connector for the drive. I still haven't installed my drive as I'm waiting for the connector, it should be a combined package offer. Hopefully all goes well.

Review.Titre: I still haven't seen my order 2 weeks…
Review.Contenu: I still haven't seen my order 2 weeks later.Every day when I click the email link to check UPS tracking it opens a blank window, then when I manually open it, it tells me "on the way" and every morning the delivery day changes to the current day.

Review.Titre: Opt for paid shipping, NOT free shipping.
Review.Contenu: Updated:  After finally receiving my order after nearly 3 weeks since ordering and being issued a partial but small refund, I will upgrade from 1 to 3 stars.  The customer service could be much better.  A replacement item should be shipped much sooner when its clearly obvious that the order is lost, especially when the shipper has not received the package in a week.  Other than that, my advice is to opt for paid shipping instead of the free shipping option.  You'll be treated better as a customer.

The memory I ordered was found on crucial.com to be compatible with my motherboard, but it did not work.  Their returns website did not work (tried 2 browsers).  Attempt to contact support via chat was unreturned.  Response to Facebook chat was several days later.  Finally got in touch with support via phone number on the Facebook site and they promptly emailed a return label.  In the end I don't doubt I'll get a full refund, but it was a pretty hassle-filled experience.  I might be willing to give them one more shot only because this happened during the Christmas/New Year holidays and they were probably short-staffed.

Review.Titre: Nobody contacted me about the package…
Review.Contenu: Nobody contacted me about the package that hasn’t arrived yet

The product was good, the delivery time wasn't fast but that was fine.  The issue was communication.  I received a notice about shipping and a few days later it still didn't show up under the tracking number and the web showed the order as complete.  I had to contact support to be assured I didn't have the wrong tracking number.  There is a blind spot in the process when it comes to transparency.

I dislike that Crucial uses UPS for transborder delivery to Canada.  UPS charges for filing customs paperwork is expensive for Canadians; double the cost Canada Post / US Postal Services charges.  And, the delivery time between USPS and UPS is the same for regular delivery.

Review.Titre: Weekend and after hour service stinks
Review.Contenu: I needed to make a change to my order, but crucial, cancelled it.I had hoped to just make a simple change to it and keep the order moving, but instead, crucial cancelled my order, made me reorder everything.

Haven't yet got the item.  UPS shipping is a bit of a sham.  UPS turned it over to USPS.  Crucia to UPS on the 3rd, UPS to USPS took till the 9th, then USPS to Vancouver took till the 13th, and Canada Post says I'll get it on the 20th.

Over 2 weeks to ship an item that you manufacture?? I get it if retailers were out of stock or something but you're the primary source of these drives. And zero updates about it until it shipped. Then the tracking # doesn't even work.

Review.Titre: I have used Crucial products several…
Review.Contenu: I have used Crucial products several times in the past all it worked great...So far I have tried several times to clone an SSD   to a larger SSD but to no avail I even paid for another cloning program an still failed...I guess I will have to wait on the phone until my call gets answered...

Good = RAM (when finally received).Bad = shipping. Why have shipping turn over the package to the USPS for final delivery? My RAM was delayed for 3 days as the USPS sent the package to NJ just to return it a few days later and deliver.

Review.Titre: Crucial is one of the more trusted names
Review.Contenu: I like that Crucial is one of the more trusted brand names in the industry, but I was disappointed by the way it was shipped to me, you sent a tracking number, but neither the first carrier & the second carrier knew where the package was for a few days. Your customer service guy didn't offer much help either.

Review.Titre: Great company and variety of memory, but it didn't work in this laptop.
Review.Contenu: The free shipping took forever!!The memory that I finally got, did not work in the laptop. I will never order another memory chip with free shipping. It took way too long before it was shipped out. My customer was waiting on her laptop for over a week. Sad..

Review.Titre: Do better research, don't just trust what they say~
Review.Contenu: Packaging and delivery as well as pricing was fantastic.  But the parts that I bought according to your recommendations were wrong.  The hard drive is too big for my computer to handle, and the 2 ram sticks to get 16 Gigs should have been a single stick for my computer.  So I was able to upgrade my 4gig to 8, but not to 16 as I had hoped. Luckily I have a friend who can use the other parts.

Review.Titre: I was unable to even register my…
Review.Contenu: I was unable to even register my products, much less check the delivery status. I will try again to register before the end of the week. It's difficult to review a product that you haven't received.

Review.Titre: I ordered but then I received an email…
Review.Contenu: I ordered but then I received an email a few days later that my item was out of stock. I even paid for fast shipping. Set me back longer than I thought. Customer service was responsive, so that bumps up my experience rating.

My payment for my Crucial order cleared PayPal on Dec. 31, 2022 including cost of 2 day express shipping. My order arrived on January 10, 2023. Granted, my express shipping was refunded (after 2nd call). Learned: fast service, NOT.

Review.Titre: First did not ship it until 3 to 4 days after you said it was shipped
Review.Contenu: First did not ship it until 3 to 4 days after I got notification of shipment…Shipping tracking is useless, never updates, You guys need to work on that.  Makes it appear to hold befor shipping just to add vaule to expited shipping??? since you offer expedited shipping and elevated charges that had to wait to get people to pay extra money excessive amount of time to ship pricing way out of market, knowing you’re one of the few providers of memory for a lockdown bios from HP You state wil will charge only after shipped.  So I got charged, then 3 days in a row, click on the tracking link... does not come up,,,as in never shipped!showed no progress till it came and I gave feedback,  then I got notifited it was here!Slow shipping, over charge for basic memory, bad shipping and tracking, bad chat support, no tracking........  Other than that it was great.the ram works...

Review.Titre: Scanner tool IDd wrong RAM. Good follow up though.
Review.Contenu: I used the scanner tool to help upgrade my PC's RAM.  The tool promises 100% compatible RAM and the price was right, so I bought some.  When I installed the RAM, my PC wouldn't start.  Not even a beep.  I did a little checking.  My chipset allows for a maximum of PC4-2133.  Crucial's scanning tool specified PC4-3200. Update: Crucial tech support contacted me to see if we could work through the problem.  Once he confirmed that the memory they sent was incompatible, they sent me a UPS return label so I didn't have to pay shipping.  I appreciate that.  Just use the scanning tool with caution and validate the memory it identifies is actually compatible.

Review.Titre: One of the two DIMMs was defective and…
Review.Contenu: One of the two DIMMs was defective and had to be RMA’d…The process involved swapping out DIMMs and flashing the latest BIOS.  I doubt that other members of my family could have done these things - especially flashing the BIOS - without my help.  I imagine that most people are like them and not me.Aren’t these tested before being released for sale?

Review.Titre: I'm assuming the order might have gone…
Review.Contenu: I'm assuming the order might have gone ok.  Not Crucial's fault, but I never received the memory.  I will have to assume that UPS didn't get it right.  I will have to re-order it.  Can't give a positive or negative review

Review.Titre: I placed an order for an in stock RAM…
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for an in stock RAM upgrade and many days later the order was still pending with no actions taken. On the website there is no method available to cancel the order. I therefore called customer support. Customer support said they would attempt to cancel the order although they could not tell me if they could cancel the order, they also said that I would not know for 2 days weather the order was cancelled or not. If the item is actually in stock it should not take 4 days to ship the item. Additionally, when the customer is tired of waiting it should be possible to easily cancel the order. These are all problems. It has been a while since I ordered from Crucial. I used to always order RAM upgrades from Crucial. I must say I am surprised at how bad the online experience was with this RAM order.

Every time I purchase RAM and/or and SSD from you to upgrade a system, I encounter hardware problems I didn't have prior to the upgrade.  This is very frustrating, prompting me to refrain from doing this every again.  It's just not worth the ensuing troubles.

Great product, great price.  However, the order processing was terrible.  Items showed as in stock (with high quantity levels - more than 1,000). Got a backorder notice. Called and was told the items were in stock and would ship that night. Items did not ship that night. Called the next day and canceled the order (and ordered from someplace else). Order then shipped the next day (even though I had canceled it).

I ordered the memory on 1/4, received shipping confirmation on 1/9. It took 13 working days for the memory to arrive. The memory was initially shipped via UPS then handed off to USPS. This created unnecesary delays.

Requested a warranty replacement. Crucial Order and Delivery processes went smoothly. The SSD product unfortunately contained corrupted partitions which made it inaccessible and unuseable as received out of the box.

Review.Titre: while the memory did work it did not…
Review.Contenu: while the memory did work it did not work with the existing memory. System would not boot with both memory pairs installed, could only use one pair or the other. This was the recommended one from the scanner. Existing pair was "Ripjaws S5 G,Skill"
My only issue was with the delivery, the date was missed twice and I thought the package might have been lost due to the lack of information on the tracking page. It finally arrived 3 days late.

Review.Titre: The order took too long to ship out
Review.Contenu: The order took too long to ship out. On the website it said immediate shipping if in stock. But I hat to wait till the holidays for America was over before shipping. I had to purchase an alternate while waiting.

Review.Titre: Did not get tracking or package
Review.Contenu: Did not get tracking or package. Big bummer. Please advise ship to address and confirmation it was put at my house and not some other house.  Now I learn it did not ship yet.  Y’all can do better with your tracking.  Get er done. LOVE your products. Pisser is getting help about existing orders.  Put an email somewhere and do not have us go thru hoops to get an answer.

Review.Titre: As I see it's read speed 6000mb/s and…
Review.Contenu: As I see it's read speed 6000mb/s and write 5000mb/s but in physical ssd both speed are under 4000mb/s but yeah it seem pretty good

I have purchased memory from Crucial in the past and when Microcenter didn't have what I needed I went to Crucial. I didn't have any issues in the past but their shipping was very poorly tracked and I had no idea when the RAM would arrive. I contacted customer service and they didn't seem to care. They simply said if it doesn't arrive in the next 2 weeks we'll issue a refund and send it again. I ordered it a week prior so that would have made it 3 weeks. Not exactly stellar service. One day it just showed up in the mail. I haven't installed the memory yet and I'm hoping there won't be an issue with the poor customer service I received just on the shipping problem.

Very slow shipping. Good customer service. Inaccurate tracking number. Purchase verification email lacking after purchase. Product is good but web site could be improved for navigation and ease of use.

Review.Titre: I believe it is rare to have a…
Review.Contenu: I believe it is rare to have a defective product from Crucial as I have ordered from them before and had no issues.  However, I ordered several DRAM units this time and one was defective.  I was able to get an RMA, but had to pay for the shipping to send it back.  I wasn't my fault that the unit was defective so why did I have to pay the return shipping?????

Review.Titre: Quality product but frustrating purchase experience
Review.Contenu: Excellent product quality but the purchase experience was less than great. I used customer service to get the exact product I needed, though took a little effort it was worth it. Crucial offered a 10% discount for using their scanner but didn't get it. Back to customer service and after 30+ minutes they told me it didn't apply to the memory I bought. Got a welcome email with a 10% discount so tried that. Of course, that didn't work either. So a little bait and switch and took almost an hour to purchase 64GB of RAM. Then the shipping they choose, UPS Mail Innovations, was terrible. Tracking that didn't give good data. Had it sitting in Salt Lake City for 5 days with no expected delivery then all of a sudden it was out for delivery. Still got a quality product, in a reasonable time, at a reasonable price, just wasn't as easy as it should have been.

Review.Titre: I have used Crucial for years
Review.Contenu: I have used Crucial for years, and for the first time, they let me down. I purchased ram and an SSD; they said one of my ideas was back-ordered. Did not say which. Two weeks later, I tried to contact them to find out when it would come, and they said I could use one of their partners. Their partners were seventy dollars cheaper for their brand. I canceled my order and purchased elsewhere, and from another brand. Not only was there a lack of communication they were price gouging me. Just about every company in America seems to care less about its customers.
Crucial products are top quality. You are my go to company for memory and SSDs. However, it took almost 2 weeks to get something I needed for a customer order. I’d like to see better delivery times.

Review.Titre: Product was OK, but the web site not
Review.Contenu: The product is good, but the the web site leaves quite a bit to be desired.  For instance, the order status has no real information, and the shipment tracking number displayed was not valid.

I am not able to find my order online. I put in the order # and password provided via email from Crucial. I also have not heard anything back about my order. The overall experience of finding compatible RAM for my PC was easy.

Review.Titre: The memory upgrade went well, but...
Review.Contenu: The memory upgrade went well. The most difficult part of the process was getting the danged packaging open.  My hands are not as nimble as they used to be and glued or heat-sealed clamshells present a problem. The PCle M.2 did not go well. Despite reading and rereading the Crucial support site and other help sites, I could not for the life of me get the danged thing installed properly in order for it to work. I decided to quit and put the original equipment back in place, as I was getting frustrated and was afraid I'd break something. In my past, I have actually built computers from scratch and thought I could handle what seemed would be a straightforward installation.  It did not work out that way. This installation probably should be handled by a professional.

Review.Titre: The cost of shipping for a decent…
Review.Contenu: The cost of shipping for a decent turnaround is too expensive.  This is RAM, not PC cases or heavy power supplies.

Although pricing is exceptional, lead times are extraordinary.. I think it took a week and a half to get my items? That being said, I would've just gone to an Office Depot or Staples to get what I needed.

Review.Titre: Order took so long to shipped after…
Review.Contenu: Order took so long to shipped after purchase on Aug 7 and then no effort was made on their end to expedite the process. They shipped the items August 17

Review.Titre: Lot less performance then i thought
Review.Contenu: Hooked up to a Thunderbolt 3 port through a external enclosure I'm only getting about 1000k transfer speeds at best. Expected a lot faster

Review.Titre: I bought memory and an SSD for my…
Review.Contenu: I bought memory and an SSD for my laptop. The memory installed without a problem. The SSD install hasn’t been successful. I am following the video install instructions. I keep getting different error messages. I tried to clean the disk using the Acronis disk cleanser after the initial cloning failure. I have tried to follow the hot links with error message and they failed to take me to the knowledge base where the error code and resolution are stored. Going to the Acronis site knowledge base and pasting in the error code didn’t help me either. It is not clear from the crucial website that there is a help desk number or chat I can use to get help. Right now I am very frustrated and may return the SSD as a dissatisfied customer if I can’t figure out how to get help soon.

Review.Titre: Placed order. And wait wait wait
Review.Contenu: Placed order, order received, in stock…next day told not in stock.  Then told shipped on 17th…nope…did not ship till 22nd according to ups. Now still awaiting till tentatively should receive on 28.   Will see…. Amazon supposedly had it in stock but your price better….get what you pay for I guess.

Product was good but shipping was extremely slow. It took 11 days for the item to arrive.  The issue with that was the fact it took about 5 or 6 days after I ordered to even ship in the first place. When I can order their product from Amazon,  BestBuy, etc. and have it within 2-4 days the 11 day time frame was disappointing. Great product but sub-par shipping times

Companies that do business on the internet should know that shipping of the product is as important as the product. The information provided by your shipping company was totally useless and incorrect. Your emails to me indicated the product was shipped but the shipping company said they DID NOT have the package. Spent a lot of time on phone with your customer service and got no answers. Said they shipped it/shipping company said they never had  the package. DUH..sad customer stuck in the middle ....mailing innovations is the very bottom of the shipping barrel..I will no longer buy from internet companies that use this mailing company.  I have had many previous problems with this shipping company, so all customers beware.

Review.Titre: I think the product is solid and the…
Review.Contenu: I think the product is solid and the support team are friendly , but I ordered a 1 tb SSD for my rog zephyrus laptop on the 10th of February, it is the 17th and it just showed as shipped with an estimated delivery on 22nd of February... That seems a bit much for an in-stock item (it showed 4-8 business days for free shipping, but still) if you want/need something quickly either prepare to pay extra for shipping or look elsewhere

The online ordering process and delivery updates were excellent. The SSD drive dramatically improved my laptop performance.  The install videos were helpful but I had an issue with Windows not recognizing the Crucial drive initially. The video did not address this problem and I had to research it online but I finally figured it out.

Ordering, product - great. Just installed - great! Delivery tracking - not so great. The UPS / USPS partnership is no something I knew about. The online hep person I spoke with was, apparently in another country or so new to the US that he did not know the difference between UPS and the USPS. Perhaps if I had known about the shipping method earlier, I would have understood - because I did not know - the tracking was not clear - it seemed to take a long time shipping - I got two delivery dates that were wrong - the third try was right. So, you may wish to work on that.

Review.Titre: Easy shopping, good price, slow shipping
Review.Contenu: What's important is that Crucial offered easy shopping, a straightforward and helpful tool for selecting the right memory, and a fair price. But I should mention that a surprisingly long time passed before shipping. Even when Crucial's order status showed "complete," it took several days before the tracking number even showed up as valid.

As a repeat customer, their products and online website are always great to use. I used Crucial's free online System scanner to assess my computer's upgrade options, then accordingly purchased 64GB of DDR4 Ram to speed up my aging Desktop PC.  Reasonable price, Excellent compatibility and nice performance boost; once again, a reliable, quality product that delivers.I'm sure the warranty would be good too, if I ever needed it...never been the case. :)The only thing preventing a 5 star rating is that, for Canadians, there is additional Duty to pay when UPS hands off to Canada Post, plus there can be confusion in tracking the package, because even signing up for txt/email alerts on the UPS app does not ensure you get them.  I didn't....But, overall, still worth buying from these guys if you want a solid product.

Review.Titre: product fine; shipping not so much
Review.Contenu: The product is fine, but the shipping was problematic. For nearly 4 days the supplied tracking number for UPS was not recognized by the UPS site. Crucial support could only offer patience. When the tracking number was accepted by UPS, it appeared that UPS handed it over to the USPS and delivery was delayed by 3 days from anticipated date. Finally got it, but...The memory installed fine and is working.

Review.Titre: I had additional and unexpected fees
Review.Contenu: I had additional and unexpected fees. First, I don't believe the pricing on your website was clear about the fact that even after selecting my address in Canada, the price listed was still in US $. Also, customs was not figured in the final price. As far as the RAM chips I bought, they so far seam to be working OK.
system scanner identified the correct memory.  Problem is my Dell does not run faster and or offer XMP overclocking so it is just as slow as before the addition.

I was really given incorrect information about how to put RAM in an iMac. It was suggested I needed to remove and put the battery back in to reset the system to acknowledge the new RAM. That means taking the Mac apart. All I need to do was to restart with the Command, Option, P, and R Heald done.

Was wondering why it took so long.  Could see in delivery, but unable to track with the numbers given.  Finally arrived and simple install.  All is good with the product.  Have used crucial multiple times fir memory update.

Review.Titre: Good Hardware & Shipping - Support Chat not so much.
Review.Contenu: The hardware arrived sooner than promised. Got around installation issues eventually. Might have been more straightforward if Support Chat actually worked. Technicians (yes, two) ghosted me after I described the issue. Fortunately I had another system that I could use to do a Google site search on Crucial for deeply buried documentation for a fix.

Memory worked great. Plug and play.I think a little over 2 weeks is a wee bit too long for the shipping. It was about a week after the order before it was shipped and then plus in transit. Can't blame that on Crucial.  A littler better with communications and I would have given 5 stars.This was not my first purchase over the years and their speed was a lot better in the past.Their product has always been excellent.

I am very satisfied with my product experience. I will note, I was quite worried when the package was said to arrive in 4 business days then arrived about 10 days later. Regardless, very great service with a comforting buying experience.

Review.Titre: Website was a big help & made huge improvement!
Review.Contenu: Website was a big help in finding the correct RAM and SSD Hard Drive for my laptop. I would rate 5 stars except while navigating the site a pop up claimed I would receive a 15% discount for using the automated upgrade tool. Pretty sure I paid full price. Don't know what happened to the discount offer. In any case I upgraded from 8 gig of RAM to 20 gig and replaced my 1 Terabyte mechanical Hard Drive with a 1 Terabyte SSD Hard Drive. Wow! Huge difference in speed and performance in general. Parts fit perfectly and changing out took about 15 minutes. Well worth the effort and cost.

Review.Titre: The Gen4 SSD works like a charm and the…
Review.Contenu: The Gen4 SSD works like a charm and the performance/price is off the chart.  The only downside is the included cloning software (Acronis Crucial Edition) is very tricky to use and has several caveats as compared to their Samsung competition.

Review.Titre: Excellent product Needs better web advice.
Review.Contenu: While the product is really good I had an issue with the wrong memory ordered that was supposed to be compatible with my system. My mistake but it was what was recommended by the pick upgrades for my system. Re-Ordered the correct one and sent the wrong one back for a credit.
Generally your web pages are good and your order process is relatively easy...Technical help is pretty good.   If you would ship USPS to a PO Box in Alaska i would be a 5*.

Review.Titre: The memory and SSD drives I purchased…
Review.Contenu: The memory and SSD drives I purchased work just fine. I was a bit disappointed in the amount of time from my purchase until I received them.  Additionally, until I received the drives I did not realize the interface was USB-C.  My Mac computers have that interface but the PCs do not which necessitated the purchase of adapters.

Products were accurate to what I ordered and shipping was speedy.  I did experience a problem: nowhere was I informed on the site that the cloning software they provide with the purchase of a Solid State Drive and needed to make a duplicate of my HDD, did not support Windows 7. The purpose of these drives is to speed up old systems; why wasn’t this on their site?  Crucial did respond when I asked for help over email, but their solution was a bit more complicated. In the end, and with much time consumed on my part, I sought out other cloning software. Thankfully I was able to get everything working with the new drive.

Review.Titre: Delivery was too slow and ups didn’t…
Review.Contenu: Delivery was too slow and ups didn’t give me updates despite signing up for it multiple times on their website.

Had difficulty getting the discount price for running the scan.  The [phone] help desk was able to resolve the problem.  The videos for installing the SSD and RAM were very instructive and their hardware installation went well.  The web instructions for using Acronis to clone my hard drive to the SSD were clear and that process went well.  Some Windows knowledge was required for setting up the boot order in the bios, and I did web searches to glean this information.

Review.Titre: Very reliable memory but was surprised…
Review.Contenu: Very reliable memory but was surprised it took a week to get.
The hardware is great, but the website doesn’t work half the time, & communication with customer service people is difficult at best

I bought RAM for my computer. The Upgrade Selector was quite good; you enter make and model info about your computer and it lists a couple of compatible options. But there are sub-options, not all of which are compatible. You have to check each one. I didn't realize this and bought the wrong RAM. But return and refund were hassle-free.
I though the process of picking memory was easy, although there was a gap of time from purchasing, to shipping where no info could be seen to estimate the delivery date. But the memory worked well.

Review.Titre: the site really helps you to select the correct memory for your pc
Review.Contenu: he site really helps you, to select the correct memory for your pc

I ordered DDR5 RAM from crucial web site for the first time and got a nice discount. however, I can't find the temperature threshold info for the RAM anywhere on the site. It's an important info particularly for laptop RAM. Otherwise the RAM fits well for my gaming laptop and performs quite well.

Review.Titre: The item arrived quickly from the US…
Review.Contenu: The item arrived quickly from the US which was great!  However, I then found out that to do my data backup prior to installation of the SSD, that I would need a USB to SATA adapter which I could have ordered from Crucial at the same time as the SSD.  So, I then needed to look around and purchase this adapter locally which was a bit annoying..
Product is great but the shipping took a long time to get here. Especially when it was shipped and received in the same state.

Hardware was easy to choose in regards to compatibility for my computer and the online purchasing experience was smooth. My only reason for not five stars is the shipping. It said it would ship UPS, which is started as, and then UPS sent it to USPS where it was lost for a bit.

Purchased a SSD to improve the performance of a desktop.  Acronis software does a good job cloning but isn't real user friendly initially - it doesn't tell you it is working, just has an icon with a spinning object.  Also, the cloned drive didn't start until I attached the Win 7 backup/system image/rescue disk, but now all is working fine.  Very happy with the improved performance.

Review.Titre: Memory and Storage Upgrade for Acer Nitro 5
Review.Contenu: I needed to bet more RAM for my computer so I got two 16GB sticks to go from 8GB to 32 GB, the memory arrived safely along with my 500GB NVMe SSD and 2TB SATA SSD. The shopping experience was easy and intuitive. I ran the crucial computer scan and quickly found what I needed. Everything fit and worked properly just like Crucial said it would. One thing I wish they had put somewhere on the site is in order for Windows to recognize the drives you need to download Acronis True Image for Crucial, I was able to find a download when I searched in Google. Overall a great shopping experience.

Memory stick is great; great price; shipping sucks; you don't deliver to USPS boxes.  But U.S. postal service is last mile delivery to our village for UPS.  They end up delivering to our po box in another city but they have to look us up.  Takes extra days and there is always the possibility that the shipment will get lost.

Awesome product.  My one complaint is probably something out of your hands.  Digital river notified me that if I received a specific email my order was paid for and ready to ship.  When it arrived that was inaccurate, my card wasn't charged for another 4 days.  Minor but communications about billing/shipping should be on point.

Review.Titre: Shakey shipping process, but Excellent product
Review.Contenu: This RAM kit and a few other parts unrelated to Crucial was my first experience upgrading a PC.Due to the length of time for it to arrive, I was worried about damage and the package being lost. However, it got here safely. Install went smoothly and now my desktop runs beautifully. I have noticed much better performance.This paired with a GPU upgrade has been a thoroughly worthwhile investment in a possibility of starting to stream games and such.I am already considering ordering an SSD from Crucial in the future.Thank you so much!

Review.Titre: I'd rate Crucial 5 stars except for…
Review.Contenu: I'd rate Crucial 5 stars except for their return process.  I accidentally ordered 3 storage cards/blades and need to return one of them.  The package is unopened and in original condition.  I filled out the online form but haven't heard anything since.  Without a Return Authorization I cannot return the blades.

Review.Titre: I was able to purchase the correct…
Review.Contenu: I was able to purchase the correct memory for my computer based on the website finder application. The memory came and it worked properly. The shipping took longer than anticipated, though.

Review.Titre: Product was as required and in good…
Review.Contenu: Product was as required and in good condition.However the delivery was left at the wrong address and I had to chase it down my self. nor was there a proof of delivery provided to help me do so.

Review.Titre: Shipping took 2 weeks when the order…
Review.Contenu: Shipping took 2 weeks when the order told me it would be around 5 days
Good Price, Very Slow Shipping. Other places were sold out so it is what it is. I got the drive at the right price so I can't complain too much.

Product is good quality. Would have given 5 stars if it didn't take so long to arrive. That said, customer service did correct the situation and mailed the product expedited after two weeks of not receiving it.

This current purchase is a replacement for the same SSD MX-500 model which proved to be defective while trying to install Win 10 three times.The new MX-500 appears to be operating just fine, as does the first (of three) MX-500 SSDs purchasedBuyers should be aware that SSDs shipped free from Crucial.com are shipped via UPSMI (UPS Mail Innovations) service, which is quite slow. My latest purchase was on April 24, and arrived two weeks later. Tracking was not possible until two days prior to delivery.

Review.Titre: The Crucial app that was supposed to…
Review.Contenu: The Crucial app that was supposed to scan my computer to determine compatible SSDs was either too slow or was broken. However, I was able to find my computer model in the list of supported computers on the web site and found the correct SSD for my computer from there.

Great product (SSD for my laptop), good price and reasonable shipping speed.Had a hiccup with the clone software they provide-had to do a full backup to a 3rd drive and then recover from there to the new drive instead. (Clone function wouldn’t work due to different sector sizes between the two drives).Other that that a great experience. Laptop boots and runs things way faster now-about 50-60% faster!

Review.Titre: Website gives good info. and product works well
Review.Contenu: Website gives very good information on which Crucial product is most suitable for our computer. Installation was a cinch with good website videos and advices. The DRAM works well from the start. Only improvement needed is speedier shipping and better tracking. Order was made on Friday and shipping didn’t really start until the next Wednesday.

Review.Titre: I bought 2x 16gb ram, darn good experience
Review.Contenu: I bought 2x 16gb ram, the product so far is great. The crucial site found a ram that works perfectly in my computer, and with the videos explaining how to change a ram- the whole process was fairly easy! It was my first time, so having those videos really helped. I was a bit nervous I’d end up with an incompatible ram, so I’m very happy with the accuracy of the program.
Good product. However, I paid extra for fast shipping, but Crucial didn't give the shipment to FedEx for a couple of days, so it arrived a day later than I had hoped for.

Website was easy to navigate, follow up by company through emails was prompt and timely updates after shipping was nice. Shipping took longer than I expected but I am not in a hurry to install the part and didn’t choose expedited shipping. I haven’t installed the part yet but it came in perfect condition.

Review.Titre: The RAM works with no problems
Review.Contenu: 8GB stock RAM to 16GB Crucial RAM, improvement can be seen on some games. (Stock RAM speed = Crucial RAM speed) When I turned my Dell on after I installed the new RAM, I was told there was new hardware present and was suggested, by my Dell, to run a hardware check by Dell and they found nothing wrong. I have not been questioned about the new hardware again, never saw any problems.

Review.Titre: I used your app to purchase a SATA ssd…
Review.Contenu: I used your app to purchase a SATA ssd drive. I used your app recommendation and was delivered a NVME ssd drive. Customer service representative did process an RMA and refund and reorder the correct item. My only complaint is that they do not provide a prepaid return envelope. I will order any crucial products in the future from Amazon, since returns are free, especially if you drop it off in a local drop off point.

I found a great product on Crucial. My laptop is so much faster now. I got a ssd and crucial recommended Acronis. Never worked. Complete dogsh*t. I used disk genius to copy my hdd to my new crucial ssd. It worked perfectly find. It's not crucial's fault that Acronis was so bad, but it would've been nice if crucial would have recommended something better. My laptop starts very quickly now. Review.Titre: Good SSD; cloning software is still not great though
Review.Contenu: I bought an SSD for my desktop PC. I got the expedited shipping this time-way better, came FedEx--no more of that UPS/USPS shared nonsense. The downloadable Acronis cloner still didn't work (I just did this same process with my laptop last month)-it just hangs when you try to clone. And yes, I'm booting clean from a USB directly into the cloning product, not from within Windows. I started it at 8am, came home at 10pm and it said "16 hours to go". I started over, and the next morning it said "3 days to go". No bueno. I ended up doing an image backup, and then swapping drives, and restoring from that image. That works, just takes longer--a few hours for 1TB. You need a better cloning product partner.

But it was such an obvious issue with the broken delivery tracking link...that, until i received the product, i was fearful that it would never get delivered! Otherwise, the product itself is great!
